sentences.en: A small group of youths stayed behind to heckle and shout abuse.
sentences.cn: 一小群小青年没走，在起哄、叫骂。

sentences.en: He mostly stayed at home tucking up the children.
sentences.cn: 他主要待在家里，帮孩子们盖好被子睡觉。

sentences.en: He stayed on until the dissolution of the firm in 1948.
sentences.cn: 他一直呆到1948年公司解散。

sentences.en: Her mother stayed for another two weeks.
sentences.cn: 她母亲又呆了两个星期。

sentences.en: I met some friends and stayed out until eleven or twelve.
sentences.cn: 我见了几个朋友，直到夜里十一二点才回家。

sentences.en: I saw other indistinct shapes that stayed out of vision.
sentences.cn: 我看见另有一些模糊的影子晃了一下就不见了。

sentences.en: I stayed obstinately in my room, sitting by the telephone.
sentences.cn: 我执意呆在房间里，坐在电话机旁边。

sentences.en: Martinez, when she served, usually stayed on the baseline.
sentences.cn: 马丁内兹发球的时候通常站在底线处。

sentences.en: Philip stayed at the hotel, according to Mr Hemming.
sentences.cn: 据亨明先生所说，菲利普住在旅馆里。

sentences.en: Scotty stayed behind to fix lunch.
So what if sometimes they stayed rather late, it doesn't mean anything.
sentences.cn: 因此，即便有时他们熬夜到很晚，那也说明不了什么。

sentences.en: The fish stayed 50 yards offshore, well out of range.
sentences.cn: 这种鱼生活在离岸50码的地方，完全钓不到。

sentences.en: The log cabin stayed empty, except when we came.
sentences.cn: 除非我们到来，要不然那间小木屋一直都是空的。

sentences.en: They stayed, safe and happy, within their own social milieu.
sentences.cn: 他们幸福无忧地呆在自己的社交圈子里。

sentences.en: They were as good as their word and stayed away.
sentences.cn: 他们信守诺言，离得远远的。

words.tran_cn: 停留，制止（stay的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 停留，停止( stay的过去式和过去分词 )，继续处于某种状态
